entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening. A few flurries beginning near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023
